post_title: T206 Magee - Cycle 460 reverse - PSA 4.5 - HIGHEST GRADED - FINAL PRICE DROP
post_content:
Greetings All:

As promised, I am offering this T206 Magee - Batting - Cycle 460 reverse!

It has been graded PSA 4.5 and is the highest one graded by PSA to date.

There are only 10 Magee cards with the Cycle 460 reverse in the PSA and SGC pop reports combined.

I'm asking [STRIKE]$1500, 1300,[/STRIKE] $1100 delivered, if interested.

An "I'll Take It!" will supersede any on-going negotiations...

Final Price Drop before it goes to auction.

Thanks for looking!
